verses.verse: וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came כִּי־ <WH3588> when יָשַׁ֥ב <WH3427> sat הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> And it came to pass when the king בְּבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> in his house וַיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD הֵנִֽיחַ־ <WH5117> had given him rest ל֥וֹ מִסָּבִ֖יב <WH5439> round about מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <WH341> from all his enemies

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> That the king אֶל־ <WH413> to נָתָ֣ן <WH5416> unto Nathan הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> the prophet רְאֵ֣ה <WH7200> See נָ֔א <WH4994> now אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> now I dwell בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in an house אֲרָזִ֑ים <WH730> of cedar וַֽאֲרוֹן֙ <WH727> but the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God יֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> dwelleth בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> within הַיְרִיעָֽה׃ <WH3407> curtains

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said נָתָן֙ <WH5416> And Nathan אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> is in בִּֽלְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> all that [is] in thine heart לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go עֲשֵׂ֑ה <WH6213> do כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with ס

וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> came בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> And it came to pass that night הַה֑וּא <WH1931> the same וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> that the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to נָתָ֖ן <WH5416> came unto Nathan לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

לֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> Go וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> and tell אֶל־ <WH413> to עַבְדִּ֣י <WH5650> my servant אֶל־ <WH413> about דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> David כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD הַאַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you תִּבְנֶה־ <WH1129> Shalt thou build לִּ֥י בַ֖יִת <WH1004> me an house לְשִׁבְתִּֽי׃ <WH3427> for me to dwell in

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> have not יָשַׁ֙בְתִּי֙ <WH3427> Whereas I have not dwelt בְּבַ֔יִת <WH1004> in [any] house לְ֠מִיּוֹם <WH3117> since the time הַעֲלֹתִ֞י <WH5927> that I brought up אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> even to this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this וָאֶֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> have been מִתְהַלֵּ֔ךְ <WH1980> but have walked בְּאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> in a tent וּבְמִשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> and in a tabernacle

בְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> which הִתְהַלַּכְתִּי֮ <WH1980> In all [the places] wherein I have walked בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> with all the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel הֲדָבָ֣ר <WH1697> I a word דִּבַּ֗רְתִּי <WH1696> spake אֶת־ <WH854> with אַחַד֙ <WH259> with any שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which צִוִּ֗יתִי <WH6680> whom I commanded לִרְע֛וֹת <WH7462> to feed אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> my people אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לָ֛מָּה <WH4100> Why לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not בְנִיתֶ֥ם <WH1129> Why build לִ֖י בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> ye not me an house אֲרָזִֽים׃ <WH730> cedar

וְ֠עַתָּה <WH6258> Now כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus תֹאמַ֞ר <WH559> Now therefore so shalt thou say לְעַבְדִּ֣י <WH5650> unto my servant לְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> David כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I לְקַחְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH3947> I took מִן־ <WH4480> from הַנָּוֶ֔ה <WH5116> thee from the sheepcote מֵאַחַ֖ר <WH310> from following הַצֹּ֑אן <WH6629> the sheep לִֽהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> become נָגִ֔יד <WH5057> to be ruler עַל־ <WH5921> over עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> over my people עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> over Israel

וָאֶהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> have been עִמְּךָ֗ <WH5973> with בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who הָלַ֔כְתָּ <WH1980> And I was with thee whithersoever thou wentest וָאַכְרִ֥תָה <WH3772> and have cut off אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֹיְבֶ֖יךָ <WH341> all thine enemies מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> out of thy sight וְעָשִׂ֤תִֽי <WH6213> and have made לְךָ֙ שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> thee a great כְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> like unto the name הַגְּדֹלִ֖ים <WH1419> of the great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> [men] that [are] in the earth

וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <WH7760> Moreover I will appoint מָ֠קוֹם <WH4725> a place לְעַמִּ֨י <WH5971> for my people לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> Israel וּנְטַעְתִּיו֙ <WH5193> and will plant וְשָׁכַ֣ן <WH7931> them that they may dwell תַּחְתָּ֔יו <WH8478> place וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יִרְגַּ֖ז <WH7264> in a place of their own and move ע֑וֹד <WH5750> again וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יֹסִ֤יפוּ <WH3254> them any more בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> no more neither shall the children עַוְלָה֙ <WH5766> of wickedness לְעַנּוֹת֔וֹ <WH6031> afflict כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> as בָּרִאשׁוֹנָֽה׃ <WH7223> as beforetime

וּלְמִן־ <WH4480> from הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> And as since the time אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> i צִוִּ֤יתִי <WH6680> that I commanded שֹֽׁפְטִים֙ <WH8199> judges עַל־ <WH5921> to be over עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> [to be] over my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וַהֲנִיחֹ֥תִי <WH5117> and have caused thee to rest לְךָ֖ מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <WH341> from all thine enemies וְהִגִּ֤יד <WH5046> telleth לְךָ֙ יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Also the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> for בַ֖יִת <WH1004> thee an house יַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> thee that he will make לְּךָ֥ יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> When יִמְלְא֣וּ <WH4390> be fulfilled יָמֶ֗יךָ <WH3117> And when thy days וְשָֽׁכַבְתָּ֙ <WH7901> and thou shalt sleep אֶת־ <WH854> with אֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <WH1> with thy fathers וַהֲקִימֹתִ֤י <WH6965> I will set up אֶֽת־ <WH853> זַרְעֲךָ֙ <WH2233> thy seed אַחֲרֶ֔יךָ <WH310> after אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יֵצֵ֖א <WH3318> thee which shall proceed מִמֵּעֶ֑יךָ <WH4578> out of thy bowels וַהֲכִינֹתִ֖י <WH3559> and I will establish אֶת־ <WH853> מַמְלַכְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH4467> his kingdom

ה֥וּא <WH1931> He יִבְנֶה־ <WH1129> He shall build בַּ֖יִת <WH1004> an house לִשְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> for my name וְכֹנַנְתִּ֛י <WH3559> and I will stablish אֶת־ <WH853> כִּסֵּ֥א <WH3678> the throne מַמְלַכְתּ֖וֹ <WH4467> of his kingdom עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I אֶהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לּ֣וֹ לְאָ֔ב <WH1> I will be his father וְה֖וּא <WH1931> he יִהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לִּ֣י לְבֵ֑ן <WH1121> and he shall be my son אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> when בְּהַ֣עֲוֹת֔וֹ <WH5753> If he commit iniquity וְהֹֽכַחְתִּיו֙ <WH3198> I will chasten בְּשֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> him with the rod אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> of men וּבְנִגְעֵ֖י <WH5061> and with the stripes בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men

וְחַסְדִּ֖י <WH2617> But my mercy לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not יָס֣וּר <WH5493> shall not depart away מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> at כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom הֲסִרֹ֙תִי֙ <WH5493> from him as I took מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> from שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> [it] from Saul אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הֲסִרֹ֖תִי <WH5493> whom I put away מִלְּפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> before

וְנֶאְמַ֨ן <WH539> shall be established בֵּיתְךָ֧ <WH1004> And thine house וּמַֽמְלַכְתְּךָ֛ <WH4467> and thy kingdom עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> ever לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> before כִּֽסְאֲךָ֔ <WH3678> thee thy throne יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become נָכ֖וֹן <WH3559> shall be established עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

כְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> According to all these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these וּכְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and all הַחִזָּי֣וֹן <WH2384> and according to all this vision הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> so דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> speak נָתָ֖ן <WH5416> so did Nathan אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> unto David ס

וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> Then went הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> David וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> in and sat לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and he said מִ֣י <WH4310> Who אָנֹכִ֞י <WH595> O אֲדֹנָ֤י <WH136> Who [am] I O Lord יְהוִה֙ <WH3069> God וּמִ֣י <WH4310> and what בֵיתִ֔י <WH1004> is my house כִּ֥י <WH3588> that הֲבִיאֹתַ֖נִי <WH935> that thou hast brought עַד־ <WH5704> against הֲלֹֽם׃ <WH1988> this

וַתִּקְטַן֩ <WH6994> And this was yet a small thing ע֨וֹד <WH5750> and yet זֹ֤את <WH2063> in בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5869> in thy sight אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> O Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3068> GOD וַתְּדַבֵּ֛ר <WH1696> but thou hast spoken גַּ֥ם <WH1571> also אֶל־ <WH413> of בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> house עַבְדְּךָ֖ <WH5650> also of thy servant's לְמֵֽרָח֑וֹק <WH7350> for a great while to come וְזֹ֛את <WH2063> likewise תּוֹרַ֥ת <WH8452> And [is] this the manner הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> O Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> GOD

וּמַה־ <WH4100> what יּוֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> more דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> David ע֖וֹד <WH5750> Again לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> say אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> about וְאַתָּ֛ה <WH859> You יָדַ֥עְתָּ <WH3045> knowest אֶֽת־ <WH853> עַבְדְּךָ֖ <WH5650> thy servant אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> unto thee? for thou Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

בַּעֲב֤וּר <WH5668> the sake דְּבָֽרְךָ֙ <WH1697> For thy word's וּֽכְלִבְּךָ֔ <WH3820> sake and according to thine own heart עָשִׂ֕יתָ <WH6213> hast thou done אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגְּדוּלָּ֖ה <WH1420> all these great things הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise לְהוֹדִ֖יעַ <WH3045> know אֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> to make thy servant

עַל־ <WH5921> For כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> this גָּדַ֖לְתָּ <WH1431> Wherefore thou art great אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֵ֣ין <WH369> there כָּמ֗וֹךָ <WH3644> like וְאֵ֤ין <WH369> is none אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God זֽוּלָתֶ֔ךָ <WH2108> beside בְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> we שָׁמַ֖עְנוּ <WH8085> thee according to all that we have heard בְּאָזְנֵֽינוּ׃ <WH241> with our ears

וּמִ֤י <WH4310> and what כְעַמְּךָ֙ <WH5971> [is] like thy people כְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> [even] like Israel גּ֥וֹי <WH1471> nation אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> And what one בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the earth אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom הָלְכֽוּ־ <WH1980> went אֱ֠לֹהִים <WH430> whom God לִפְדּֽוֹת־ <WH6299> to redeem ל֨וֹ לְעָ֜ם <WH5971> for a people וְלָשׂ֧וּם <WH7760> to himself and to make ל֣וֹ שֵׁ֗ם <WH8034> him a name וְלַעֲשׂ֨וֹת <WH6213> and to do לָכֶ֜ם הַגְּדוּלָּ֤ה <WH1420> for you great things וְנֹֽרָאוֹת֙ <WH3372> and terrible לְאַרְצֶ֔ךָ <WH776> for thy land מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> before עַמְּךָ֗ <WH5971> thy people אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom פָּדִ֤יתָ <WH6299> which thou redeemedst לְּךָ֙ מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> to thee from Egypt גּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> [from] the nations וֵאלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> God

וַתְּכ֣וֹנֵֽן <WH3559> For thou hast confirmed לְ֠ךָ אֶת־ <WH853> עַמְּךָ֨ <WH5971> to thyself thy people יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל ׀ <WH3478> Israel לְךָ֛ לְעָ֖ם <WH5971> [to be] a people עַד־ <WH5704> unto thee for עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> ever וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> O יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> and thou LORD הָיִ֥יתָ <WH1961> art become לָהֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> their God ס
